```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

data_uri <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2018/2018-04-02/us_avg_tuition.xlsx'
filename <- str_split(data_uri, pattern = '/')[[1]] %>% tail(1)
filepath <- file.path('.', 'data', filename)

download.file(data_uri, filepath)
```
